verses.esv: 14 For the body does not consist of one member but of many.
verses.kjv: 14 For the body is not one member, but many.
verses.niv: 14 Now the body is not made up of one part but of many.

verses.esv: 29 Are not two sparrows sold for a penny? And not one of them will fall to the ground apart from your Father. 30 But even the hairs of your head are all numbered. 31 Fear not, therefore; you are of more value than many sparrows.
verses.kjv: 29 Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father. 30 But the very hairs of your head are all numbered. 31 Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.
verses.niv: 29 Are not two sparrows sold for a penny? Yet not one of them will fall to the ground apart from the will of your Father. 30 And even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. 31 So don't be afraid; you are worth more than many sparrows.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 26 Then God said, “Let us make man in our image, after our likeness. And let them have dominion over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the heavens and over the livestock and over all the earth and over every creeping thing that creeps on the earth.”
verses.kjv: 26 And God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the cattle, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth.
verses.niv: 26 Then God said, "Let us make man in our image, in our likeness, and let them rule over the fish of the sea and the birds of the air, over the livestock, over all the earth, and over all the creatures that move along the ground."

verses.esv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
verses.kjv: 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.niv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.esv: 8 but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.kjv: 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.niv: 8 But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

verses.esv: 6 Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
verses.kjv: 6 Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.niv: 6 Jesus answered, "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

verses.esv: 19 Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.”
verses.kjv: 19 Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: 20 Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
verses.niv: 19 Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

verses.esv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,
verses.kjv: 23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.niv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,

verses.esv: 1:1 In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
verses.kjv: 1 In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
verses.niv: 1 In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.

verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv: 13 No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to man. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tempted beyond your ability, but with the temptation he will also provide the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.
verses.kjv: 13 There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
verses.niv: 13 No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can stand up under it.

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

verses.esv: 19 We love because he first loved us.
verses.kjv: 19 We love him, because he first loved us.
verses.niv: 19 We love because he first loved us.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, 17 that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work.
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness: 17 That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness, 17 so that the man of God may be thoroughly equipped for every good work.

verses.esv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God. 8 Anyone who does not love does not know God, because God is love.
verses.kjv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God. 8 He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
verses.niv: 7 Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God. 8 Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.

verses.esv: 22 But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.
verses.kjv: 22 But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.
verses.niv: 22 Do not merely listen to the word, and so deceive yourselves. Do what it says.

verses.esv:
6   For to us a child is born,
    to us a son is given;
  and the government shall be upon his shoulder,
    and his name shall be called
  Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God,
    Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.
verses.kjv: 6 For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
verses.niv: 6 For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

verses.esv:
Nun

105   Your word is a lamp to my feet
    and a light to my path.
verses.kjv: 105 Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
verses.niv: 105 Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light for my path.

verses.esv:
10   For my father and my mother have forsaken me,
    but the LORD will take me in.
verses.kjv: 10 When my father and my mother forsake me, then the LORD will take me up.
verses.niv: 10 Though my father and mother forsake me, the LORD will receive me.

verses.esv: 20 Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and eat with him, and he with me.
verses.kjv: 20 Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
verses.niv: 20 Here I am! I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in and eat with him, and he with me.

verses.esv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God.
verses.kjv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
verses.niv: 7 Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.

verses.esv: 27 Religion that is pure and undefiled before God the Father is this: to visit orphans and widows in their affliction, and to keep oneself unstained from the world.
verses.kjv: 27 Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
verses.niv: 27 Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.
